findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions within one hour and may take advantage of it by setting the `holdTime` to 3600 or calling the `addBlacklist` function.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `addBlacklist` function.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
findings.function: balanceOf, totalSupply, symbol, decimals, name, transferOwnership, renounceOwnership

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is necessary to remove unnecessary code and optimize contract performance.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The comparison to boolean constants is redundant. Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Variables defined in local scope have same name as upper scoped variables.
